verses.text: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.
I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, andstrengthenedst me withstrength in my soul.
All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, when they hear the words of thy mouth.
Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*: for great isthe glory of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Though the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*behigh, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*will perfect that whichconcerneth me: thy mercy, O \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, endurethfor ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
